source.1ed16258:
eye_data = ['pupil','eyebrow_Outer','eyebrow_Inner',
        'eye_Outer','eye_Top','eye_Bottom','eye_Inner']

eye_Left = {
               "pupil": [130.5, 181.4], 
               "eyebrow_Outer": [93.4,160.3],
               "eyebrow_Inner":[153.3, 164.1],
               "eye_Outer":[113.1,183.5],
               "eye_Top":[129.7,175.7],
               "eye_Bottom":[128.5,191.9],
               "eye_Inner":[144.4,187.2],
}      

eye_Right = {
               "pupil": [222.3, 182.0],
               "eyebrow_Outer":[258.4,161.3],
               "eyebrow_Inner":[196.4,164.0],
               "eye_Outer":[238.9,183.6],
               "eye_Top":[222.3,175.8],
               "eye_Bottom":[224.1,191.9],
               "eye_Inner":[207.6,187.5],    
}

nose = {
    
    "roof_Left":[163.6,190.5],
    "roof_Right":[186.7,190.8],
}
    
print("Right Eye Data: \n")
for i in eye_data:
    print("%s: %s"%(i,eye_Left[i]))
    
print("")

print("Left Eye Data: \n")
for i in eye_data:
    print("%s: %s"%(i,eye_Right[i]))

print("")

print("Nose Data: \n")
for i in nose:
    print("%s: %s"%(i,nose[i]))
source.e791c54d:
eye_Left = {
               "pupil": [130.5, 181.4], 
               "eyebrow_Outer": [93.4,160.3],
               "eyebrow_Inner":[153.3, 164.1],
               "eye_Outer":[113.1,183.5],
               "eye_Top":[129.7,175.7],
               "eye_Bottom":[128.5,191.9],
               "eye_Inner":[144.4,187.2],
}      

eye_Right = {
               "pupil": [222.3, 182.0],
               "eyebrow_Outer":[258.4,161.3],
               "eyebrow_Inner":[196.4,164.0],
               "eye_Outer":[238.9,183.6],
               "eye_Top":[222.3,175.8],
               "eye_Bottom":[224.1,191.9],
               "eye_Inner":[207.6,187.5],    
}

nose = {
    
    "roof_Left":[163.6,190.5],
    "roof_Right":[186.7,190.8],
}

d_x = pow((eye_Left['pupil'][0] - eye_Right['pupil'][0]), 2)
d_y = pow((eye_Left['pupil'][1] - eye_Right['pupil'][1]), 2)
optical_c = pow((d_x + d_y), 0.5) - 20

print("兩瞳孔中心連線距離：%f mm"%optical_c)

nose_roof_d_x = pow((nose['roof_Left'][0] - nose['roof_Right'][0]), 2)
nose_roof_d_y = pow((nose['roof_Left'][1] - nose['roof_Right'][1]), 2)

bridge_width_sample = pow((nose_roof_d_x + nose_roof_d_y), 0.5) - 4
print("鼻樑距離：%f mm"%bridge_width_sample)
source.ba6ee357:
new_data = new_data.loc[new_data.bridge_width >= bridge_width_sample]
print("適合消費者選擇的眼鏡有下列：")
new_data
source.3ad8b494:
data_exception = data.loc[(data.frame_optical_center < optical_c-1) | (data.frame_optical_center > optical_c+1) | (data.bridge_width < bridge_width_sample)]
print("為消費者排除掉的眼鏡選項為下列：")
data_exception
